The Quranic researcher, no, is a deterrent and a milestone for him from his empty greed and a cut of his disappointed hurry and his saying of his grace is that our signs were of a prestigious senior What was accepted as if it was said that it was not imprisoned from the request of the increase and what was directed to him to protect him, so it was said that he was a budget for the verses of the blessing, and it is the evidence of the verse or the verse He said in it what he said and the stubbornness is appropriate for the removal and prevented from the increase.I will be stuck with a hard obstacle, and it is an example of the hardship of difficult, difficult torture that does not unbearable the likeness of what God has attached to Him, who is blessed with the righteousness of the The struggle in the struggling mountains (P-123) is divorced, and it was given to him on the way of the mandatory boss.Al -Khadri is a light: “The reaction is a mountain of fire in which seventy one is a difference, and then it is ever in it and for it ﷺ: His hand was melted, and if he raised it, she returns, and if he put his leg, he was dissolved, and if he raised it, she is back."
